languages.text: "Я же не могла просто тебя бросить. Даже у контрабандисток есть принципы... и чувства". {n}Джай слабо улыбается.{/n} "К сожалению, все, что мне удалось — потратить кучу твоих тронов без какого-либо результата. Никто из дельцов, ведущих дела с ксеносами, не знал, где тебя искать. Даже Пощада... Зря я сунулась к нему. Когда-то он помог мне перебраться в Простор и наладить здесь дела, но мне было спокойнее, пока он оставался в моем прошлом".

"It's not as if I could just abandon you. Even smugglers have principles... and feelings." {n}Jae gives you a small smile.{/n} "Unfortunately, all I managed to do was spend a pile of your thrones without anything to show for it. None of the operatives who do business with xenos knew where to find you. Not even Mercy... I shouldn't have reached out to him. He helped me move to the Expanse and set up business here a long time ago, but I liked it better when he was safely in my past."
languages.original_text: "Я же не могла просто тебя бросить. Даже у контрабандисток есть принципы... и чувства". {n}Джай слабо улыбается.{/n} "К сожалению, все, что мне удалось — потратить кучу твоих тронов без какого-либо результата. Никто из дельцов, ведущих дела с ксеносами, не знал, где тебя искать. Даже Пощада... Зря я сунулась к нему. He helped me move to the Expanse and set up business here a long time ago, but I liked it better when he was safely in my past."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: «No iba a abandonarle sin más. Hasta los contrabandistas tenemos principios... y sentimientos». {n}Jae te dedica una sonrisita.{/n} «Lamentablemente, lo único que logré fue gastar un montón de sus tronos sin resultados que lo justificaran. Ninguno de los agentes que tratan con xenos sabían dónde buscarle. Ni siquiera Mercy... No debería haber contactado con él. Me ayudó a trasladarme a la Extensión y montar aquí mi negocio, pero me gustaba más que formara parte solo de mi pasado».
languages.original_text: "It's not as if I could just abandon you. Even smugglers have principles... and feelings." {n}Jae gives you a small smile.{/n} "Unfortunately, all I managed to do was spend a pile of your thrones without anything to show for it. None of the operatives who do business with xenos knew where to find you. Not even Mercy... I shouldn't have reached out to him. He helped me move to the Expanse and set up business here a long time ago, but I liked it better when he was safely in my past."

traits.locale_text: «No iba a abandonarle sin más. Hasta los contrabandistas tenemos principios... y sentimientos». {n}Jae te dedica una sonrisita.{/n} «Lamentablemente, lo único que logré fue gastar un montón de sus tronos sin resultados que lo justificaran. Ninguno de los agentes que tratan con xenos sabían dónde buscarle. Ni siquiera Mercy... No debería haber contactado con él. Me ayudó a trasladarme a la Extensión y montar aquí mi negocio, pero me gustaba más que formara parte solo de mi pasado».
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: “我不能就那么抛弃你，即便是走私犯也有原则……和感情。”{n}婕伊对你微微一笑，{/n}“遗憾的是，我花了你一大笔王座币，却没有得到任何回报。那些和异形打交道的特工不知道你去了什么地方，就连悯慈也不知道你的下落……我本不该找他才对。很久以前，他帮我搬到了科罗努斯扩区，帮我在这里建立了我的商业网络，但我更希望他能安安静静地消失，化为过去的影子。”
languages.original_text: "It's not as if I could just abandon you. Even smugglers have principles... and feelings." {n}Jae gives you a small smile.{/n} "Unfortunately, all I managed to do was spend a pile of your thrones without anything to show for it. None of the operatives who do business with xenos knew where to find you. Not even Mercy... I shouldn't have reached out to him. He helped me move to the Expanse and set up business here a long time ago, but I liked it better when he was safely in my past."

traits.locale_text: “我不能就那么抛弃你，即便是走私犯也有原则……和感情。”{n}婕伊对你微微一笑，{/n}“遗憾的是，我花了你一大笔王座币，却没有得到任何回报。那些和异形打交道的特工不知道你去了什么地方，就连悯慈也不知道你的下落……我本不该找他才对。很久以前，他帮我搬到了科罗努斯扩区，帮我在这里建立了我的商业网络，但我更希望他能安安静静地消失，化为过去的影子。”
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: 「あんたを見捨てたりはしないよ。密輸人にだって正義はあるんだ…それに感情もね」{n}ジェイは小さく笑う。{/n}「残念ながら、あたしができたことと言ったら、あんたの資産を使いまくったことくらだよ。異種族と取り引きしている者のなかに、あんたの居場所を知ってるやつはいなかったんだ。マーシーですらね…あいつに聞くんじゃなかった。ずっと前に、エクスパンスに引っ越してここでビジネスを始める手伝いをしてくれたんだけど、あいつの存在は過去にとどめておいた方がよかった」
languages.original_text: "It's not as if I could just abandon you. Even smugglers have principles... and feelings." {n}Jae gives you a small smile.{/n} "Unfortunately, all I managed to do was spend a pile of your thrones without anything to show for it. None of the operatives who do business with xenos knew where to find you. Not even Mercy... I shouldn't have reached out to him. He helped me move to the Expanse and set up business here a long time ago, but I liked it better when he was safely in my past."

traits.locale_text: 「あんたを見捨てたりはしないよ。密輸人にだって正義はあるんだ…それに感情もね」{n}ジェイは小さく笑う。{/n}「残念ながら、あたしができたことと言ったら、あんたの資産を使いまくったことくらだよ。異種族と取り引きしている者のなかに、あんたの居場所を知ってるやつはいなかったんだ。マーシーですらね…あいつに聞くんじゃなかった。ずっと前に、エクスパンスに引っ越してここでビジネスを始める手伝いをしてくれたんだけど、あいつの存在は過去にとどめておいた方がよかった」
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: « Vous pensiez peut-être que j'allais vous abandonner ? Allons, même les contrebandiers ont des principes... et des sentiments. {n}Jae vous adresse un sourire timide.{/n} Malheureusement, tout ce que j'ai réussi à faire, c'est jeter votre argent par les fenêtres en pure perte. Aucun des agents qui collaborent avec les xénos n'a su me dire où vous étiez, Mercy compris... Je n'aurais jamais dû le contacter. Il est vrai qu'il m'a aidée à m'établir dans les Étendues autrefois, mais j'aurais préféré éviter qu'il fasse de nouveau irruption dans ma vie. »
languages.original_text: "It's not as if I could just abandon you. Even smugglers have principles... and feelings." {n}Jae gives you a small smile.{/n} "Unfortunately, all I managed to do was spend a pile of your thrones without anything to show for it. None of the operatives who do business with xenos knew where to find you. Not even Mercy... I shouldn't have reached out to him. He helped me move to the Expanse and set up business here a long time ago, but I liked it better when he was safely in my past."

traits.locale_text: « Vous pensiez peut-être que j'allais vous abandonner ? Allons, même les contrebandiers ont des principes... et des sentiments. {n}Jae vous adresse un sourire timide.{/n} Malheureusement, tout ce que j'ai réussi à faire, c'est jeter votre argent par les fenêtres en pure perte. Aucun des agents qui collaborent avec les xénos n'a su me dire où vous étiez, Mercy compris... Je n'aurais jamais dû le contacter. Il est vrai qu'il m'a aidée à m'établir dans les Étendues autrefois, mais j'aurais préféré éviter qu'il fasse de nouveau irruption dans ma vie. »
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: "Ich kann Euch doch nicht einfach fallenlassen. Selbst Schmuggler haben Prinzipien ... und Gefühle." {n}Jae schenkt dir ein kleines Lächeln.{/n} "Unglücklicherweise ist es mir nur gelungen, einen Haufen Eurer Thronmünzen auszugeben, ohne dafür etwas vorweisen zu können. Keiner der Agenten, die Geschäfte mit Xenos machen, wussten, wo man Euch findet. Nicht einmal Mercy ... Ich hätte ihn nicht kontaktieren sollen. Er hat mir vor langer Zeit geholfen, in die Ausdehnung zu ziehen und hier geschäftlich Fuß zu fassen, aber es hat mir besser gefallen, als er noch fest in meiner Vergangenheit saß."
languages.original_text: "It's not as if I could just abandon you. Even smugglers have principles... and feelings." {n}Jae gives you a small smile.{/n} "Unfortunately, all I managed to do was spend a pile of your thrones without anything to show for it. None of the operatives who do business with xenos knew where to find you. Not even Mercy... I shouldn't have reached out to him. He helped me move to the Expanse and set up business here a long time ago, but I liked it better when he was safely in my past."

Selbst Schmuggler haben Prinzipien ... und Gefühle." {n}Jae schenkt dir ein kleines Lächeln.{/n} "Unglücklicherweise ist es mir nur gelungen, einen Haufen Eurer Thronmünzen auszugeben, ohne dafür etwas vorweisen zu können. Keiner der Agenten, die Geschäfte mit Xenos machen, wussten, wo man Euch findet. Nicht einmal Mercy ... Ich hätte ihn nicht kontaktieren sollen. Er hat mir vor langer Zeit geholfen, in die Ausdehnung zu ziehen und hier geschäftlich Fuß zu fassen, aber es hat mir besser gefallen, als er noch fest in meiner Vergangenheit saß."

languages.original_text: "It's not as if I could just abandon you. Even smugglers have principles... and feelings." {n}Jae gives you a small smile.{/n} "Unfortunately, all I managed to do was spend a pile of your thrones without anything to show for it. None of the operatives who do business with xenos knew where to find you. Not even Mercy... I shouldn't have reached out to him. He helped me move to the Expanse and set up business here a long time ago, but I liked it better when he was safely in my past."

languages.text: "Seni kaderine terk edecek hâlim yoktu sonuçta. Kaçakçıların bile prensipleri ve duyguları vardır." {n}Jae sana hafifçe gülümsüyor.{/n} "Maalesef yığınla geltini harcamama rağmen herhangi bir karşılık alamadım, elimden daha fazlası gelmedi. Zenolarla iş yapanların hiçbiri seni nerede bulacağını bilmiyordu. Merhamet bile. Onunla irtibata geçmemeliydim. Uzun zaman önce Enginlik'e yerleşmeme ve burada işlerimi ayarlamama yardım etmişti ama onu geçmişimde bırakarak iyi yapmıştım."
languages.original_text: "It's not as if I could just abandon you. Even smugglers have principles... and feelings." {n}Jae gives you a small smile.{/n} "Unfortunately, all I managed to do was spend a pile of your thrones without anything to show for it. None of the operatives who do business with xenos knew where to find you. Not even Mercy... I shouldn't have reached out to him. He helped me move to the Expanse and set up business here a long time ago, but I liked it better when he was safely in my past."

traits.locale_text: "Seni kaderine terk edecek hâlim yoktu sonuçta. Kaçakçıların bile prensipleri vardır. Duyguları da." {n}Jae sana hafifçe gülümsüyor.{/n} "Maalesef yığınla geltini harcamama rağmen herhangi bir karşılık alamadım, elimden daha fazlası gelmedi. Zenolarla iş yapan operatörlerin hiçbiri seni nerede bulacağını bilmiyordu. Mercy bile. Onunla irtibata geçmemeliydim. Uzun zaman önce Enginlik'e yerleşmeme ve burada işlerimi ayarlamama yardım etmişti ama güvenli bir şekilde geçmişimde kalmış hâldeyken daha iyiydi."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion
